page.title: 18Lpool Newsham,Communications
page.content: The telephone exchange is located at the corner of Doric Rd and Wharncliffe Rd.It is now called a 'Director Exchange' and it covers several districts including Stony Croft, Old Swan and West Derby.There are about 24000 subscribers in the area mostly residential and some commercial. The exchange was built in 1934 as a manual exchange and converted in 1952 into an automatic,using Stowger equipment.2 more exchanges were added in 1965 and 1974.There are plans in the next few years to install the very latest equipment called System X.
